question: The Ras Muhammad National Park is located in which country?
explanation: Ras Muhammad National Park is located in the Sinai Peninsula of Egypt between Gulf of Suez to the west and Gulf of Aqaba to the east. This national park encompasses two Saudi Arabian islands such as Sanfir and Tiran Islands. This national park has desert habitats, mountains, wadis and plays an important role in bird migration. The coast of this national park forms an important diving site which contains shipwrecks and fringing and hermalyptic type coral reefs.
